title: SGC Graded St. Louis Browns & Cardinals FS - New Cards Added
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: SGC Graded St. Louis Browns & Cardinals FS - New Cards Added
posts.post_content:
Good evening.  Thinning the herd so to speak so I am offering up this group of Brownies and Cardinals for sale.  All common backs, nothing rare.  All prices include shipping.  Regular Paypal preferred.

SOLD OR ON HOLD

Dode Criss, SGC 35, nice eye appeal - $27.00 - SOLD
Hobe Ferris, SGC 55 - $52.00 - SOLD
Jimmy Williams, SGC 50 - TRADED
Joe Lake (Ball In Hand), SGC 50 - $60.00 - SOLD
John McAleese, SGC 40 - $27.00 - SOLD
Jim Stephens, SGC 50 - $50.00 - SOLD
Joe Lake (No Ball In Hand), SGC 45 - TRADED
Harry Howell (Portrait), SGC 60 - $100.00 - SOLD
Al Shaw, SGC 20 - Good looking card with glue residue on back - $23.00 - SOLD
Vic Willis (With Bat), SGC 35 - $75.00 - SOLD
Billy Gilbert, SGC 35 - $30.00 - SOLD
Charlie Rhodes, SGC 40 - $40.00 - SOLD
Jap Barbeau, SGC 40 - $40.00 - SOLD
Bobby Byrne, SGC 40, $38.00 - SOLD
Rube Geyer, SGC 35 - $30.00 - SOLD
Chappie Charles, SGC 60 - $100.00 - HOLD
Rudy Hulswitt, SGC 60 - $100.00 - HOLD
Eddie Phelps, SGC 55 - $80.00 - HOLD
Roger Bresnahan, SGC 35 (Portrait) - $90.00 - HOLD

AVAILABLE

Bill Dineen, SGC 40 - $34.00
Steve Evans, SGC 60 - $85.00
Jack Bliss, SGC 45 - $38.00

Three left.  Get 'em while they're hot :)

One left:

Bill Dineen, SGC 40 - $45.00.  

Would also trade for a like kind T212 stamped "Gilliam Squires".
A bunch of new cards added, mostly Cardinals.

I'll take: Gilbert, Rhodes, Barbeau, Byrne, & Geyer
- Eric
Prices lowered on the remaining three.
Price drops on the last three.  Last bump before eBay.
